description: Second-year environmental engineering major from Chicago. Fall '12 AM class, BK 1935. Love everything Georgia Tech and a die-hard Cubs/Bulls/Bears fan. Current resident of 204, probably just going to live here forever. If you like 2 Chainz I probably like you. Go Jackets and Go Choppers.
aspects: Gamedays and whiskey buckets, magic carpet ride, semiformal and formal, cocktail party, wet friday, initiation week
name: Griffin Hanekamp
